plot: A mixed race high school student struggles to care for her depressed alcoholic father after the untimely death of her mother. Her world is turned upside down when family friends confront and assault her for dating a girl.
title: Something Like a Butterfly
plot_es: A mixed race high school student struggles to care for her depressed alcoholic father after the untimely death of her mother. Her world is turned upside down when family friends confront and assault her for dating a girl.
plot_en: A mixed race high school student struggles to care for her depressed alcoholic father after the untimely death of her mother. Her world is turned upside down when family friends confront and assault her for dating a girl.
